setup_script_description: sets focus on and expands the Combobox, and sets the focused option to 'Huckleberry'
task: navigate backwards by ten options in listbox popup
specific_user_instruction: with focus on the listbox popup, navigate backwards by ten options.
output_assertions: Text of the focused option in the popup ('Banana') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (not selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (3) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (13) is conveyed
